ComicInfo.Title: 900th commemorative issue!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:19:46. [CVDB176023]
ComicInfo.Writer: Charlie Huston, Duane Swierczynski, Fred Van Lente, James Felder, Jason Aaron, Joe Kelly, Mike Benson, Victor Gischler
ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Staggs, Dalibor Talajić, Damion Scott, Kyle Baker, Pete Woods, Rob Liefeld, Sanford Greene, Shawn Crystal

ComicInfo.Colorist: Dave McCaig, Lee Loughridge, Marte Gracia, Shannon Blanchard
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Bob Harras, Jody LeHeup, Joe Quesada, Matt Idelson, Paul Tutrone
